BiometryTraining: Functions to Assist Design and Analysis of Agronomic Experiments

Source: R/BiometryTraining-package.R
BiometryTraining.Rd

Provides functions to aid in the design and analysis of agronomic and agricultural experiments through easy access to documentation and helper functions, especially for users who are learning these concepts.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://biometryhub.github.io/BiometryTraining/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/biometryhub/BiometryTraining/issues
